column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////As far as the main dish
column2: we orded the seafood paiai and it was just okay. The dessert was complimented to us by our waiter after we downloaded their lettuce eats app
column3: which was really nice of him! The truffle chocolate was very small but rich. My favorite was the spicy potatoes definitely a must order! I know a lot of people love this spot and I can see why
